com.nukethemoon.tools.ani

Class AnimationsFinishedCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nukethemoon.tools.ani.AnimationsFinishedCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimationFinishedListener

    public class AnimationsFinishedCollector
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnimationFinishedListener
    Can be used to wait for multiple animations to finish. Collects onAnimationFinished calls and calls the assigned listener.

        Creates a new instance.
